issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
TableViewRow don't drawing on Ti SDK 6.1.0.v20161118021723

Ti SDK 6.0.0.GA is ok.

{code:java}
...
      <TableView id="tableView" ...>
        <TableViewSection>
          <TableViewRow class="nonSelectionStyle">
            <Label id="sn_notifyPush" text="L('sn_notifyPush')" class="leftMargin" />
            <Switch class="rightMargin" id="permission_push_switch"/>
            <View class="lineBottom" />
          </TableViewRow>
          <TableViewRow class="nonSelectionStyle">
            <Label id="sn_notifyEventAndNotice" text="L('sn_notifyEventAndNotice')" class="leftMargin" />
            <Switch class="rightMargin" id="Installation_channels_eventSwitch"/>
            <View class="lineBottom" />
          </TableViewRow>
        </TableViewSection>

        ...
      </TableView>
...
{code}

comments.body:

*Environment*
{code:java}
